name: Elf Defence (ClaymoreKiwi)
description:
THEME - TOP OF THE TREE.

Play as Santa sitting atop a Christmas tree and defend against the ongoing waving of giant elves! use power-ups to make Santa stronger

use the numbers 1, 2, or 3 to select power-ups accordingly - the rest of the rules are in the game

Enjoy!

Christmas Game Jam game - 1st year BCU - developed by a team of 5 .

Art and assets credit to - Andrianna  And Jack

Coding and Unity Dev Credits to: James , Bryce , and Sam
